page.title: 16The Villa Restaurant
page.content:
The Villa Restaurant is one of the attractions of the area. It was built in the middle of the last century and is a fine example of a Victorian country house - built for a local mill- owner but since changed into a restaurant. The busiest time of the week is Saturday evening when it will cater for up to 120 customers; it is open 7 days a week and is non-residential. There are 3 chefs 2 of whom live in; the manager also has a flat. The rest of the staff is :- 2 'commis' chefs, 12 waitresses, and 4 bar staff.
Examples from the Menu:- Soup 95p: Sirloin Steak #5.45 Italian Ice cream 80p Coffee 65p
